name: Jinwook Seo
content: SNU HCI LabAbout UsWe aim for excellence in transforming novel ideas into successful research projects and into technology innovations, which contributes to improving quality of life.We are interested in designing, developing, and evaluating user interfaces and interaction techniques to help users solve their challenging problems in everyday life.Human-Computer InteractionDesigning intuitive interfaces and interaction techniques that enhance user experience and productivity across diverse computing platforms.Human-Data InteractionExploring how people interact with data through visualization, analytics tools, and interactive systems to support decision-making.Human-AI InteractionInvestigating how humans and AI systems can collaborate effectively, focusing on user-centered AI design.Recent ProjectsUMATOUniform Manifold Approximation with Two-phase OptimizationDistortion-Aware BrushingDistortion-aware Brushing for Reliable Cluster Analysis in Multidimensional ProjectionsClusterSenseExplainable Nonlinear Dimensionality Reduction with Feature-Driven InteractionS&UILeveraging Multimodal LLM for Inspirational User Interface SearchUnveiling High-dimensional BackstageA Survey for Reliable Visual Analytics with Dimensionality ReductionDataset-Adaptive Dimensionality ReductionDataset-Adaptive Dimensionality Reduction for Reliable and Efficient Visual AnalyticsCluster-Label MatchingMeasuring the Validity of Clustering Validation DatasetsLitWeaverSupporting Novice Researchers to Write Literature Review using Language ModelsPhenoFlowA Human-LLM Driven Visual Analytics System for Exploring Large and Complex Stroke DatasetsFields, Bridges, and Foundations: How Researchers Browse Citation Network VisualizationsWhat are the specific elements researchers want to see in a citation network?Natural Language Dataset Generation Framework for Visualizations Powered by Large Language Modelsa Large Language Model (LLM) framework that generates rich and diverse NL datasets using only Vega-Lite specifications as inputEnhancing Data Literacy On-demand: LLMs as Guides for Novices in Chart InterpretationChart reading guidance using LLM through both textual and visual annotationsNewsView All2025Oct 16Aeri's full paper on explainable DR is accepted for publication in TVCG.Aug 21UMATO and Distortion-aware brushing are accepted for the publication in TVCG.Jul 15Hyeon's full paper and Jiyeon's short paper on dimensionality reduction will appear in IEEE VIS 2025!Jun 15Hyeon's short paper on exploring DR literature is accepted for publication in EuroVis 2025.Apr 08Hyeon's full paper on clustering validation is accepted for publication in IEEE TPAMI.
